title._content: [Boston Horticultural Society Exhibition, Horticultural Hall, Massachusetts Avenue, Boston, Massachusetts. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. [Boston Horticultural Society Exhibition, Horticultural Hall, Massachusetts Avenue, Boston, Massachusetts. Wildflower exhibition garden] [1921 May] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site history. Building: Wheelwright & Haven, building architect, dedicated 1901. Landscape: Albert Burrage; Douglas Eccleston; Frederick Popcock. Today: Building extant. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Published in: Gardens for a Beautiful America / Sam Watters. New York : Acanthus Press, 2012. Figure 14. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16566 Call Number: LC-J717-X105- 28
